# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pygments/__main__.py
@source-hash: 7acf0428cbd78f9c
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:59:41Z

**Primary Purpose:**
Entry point module for executing Pygments as a Python module via `python -m pygments`. Provides a minimal wrapper that delegates to the main command-line interface.

**Key Components:**
- **main() invocation (L15)**: Calls `pip._vendor.pygments.cmdline.main()` with command-line arguments from `sys.argv`
- **KeyboardInterrupt handler (L16-17)**: Catches Ctrl+C interruption and exits with status code 1
- **sys.exit() wrapper (L15)**: Ensures proper exit status propagation from the cmdline module

**Dependencies:**
- `sys`: For argv access and exit status control
- `pip._vendor.pygments.cmdline`: The actual command-line implementation module

**Architectural Pattern:**
Standard Python module entry point pattern using `__main__.py`. Follows the common practice of minimal error handling (KeyboardInterrupt only) and clean delegation to the primary implementation module.

**Critical Behavior:**
- Normal execution: Exit status determined by `cmdline.main()` return value
- Interrupted execution: Always exits with status 1
- All other exceptions: Propagate uncaught (will result in stack trace)
